backend/main.mo: Actor canister managing pets, vaccinations, medications, and appointments with CRUD-style add and query functions using List collections.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping features to impacted frontend files and associated components, tests, and confidence indicators.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of all major frontend files for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file intended for global or legacy styles but currently containing no rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app entry point and defining metadata for the Pawfect Care site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal app component that renders the PawfectCareLanding page.
frontend/src/components/icons/MobileInHa: SVG icon component rendering a hand holding a phone with signal waves.
frontend/src/components/PawfectCareLandi: Large landing-page component containing hero, services, testimonials, FAQs, and SafeImage-based media with navigation and branding UI.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that swaps to a styled placeholder on load error while preserving layout size.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor instance based on authenticated or anonymous identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for the Chewy-blue theme plus SafeImage utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/publicAssetUrl.ts: Helper building base-path-safe URLs for static assets using Vite's BASE_URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations for project styling.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, deployment goals, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for build planning.
